subject: The Calendars Are Signed
event: I've defaced 'em all. (See? Sometimes I finish SOONER than I estimate!!!) The calendars are all signed, packed up in three big boxes, and waiting for UPS to come by, pick them up, and return them to DBPro for distribution. Me, I'm going back to DANCE. Maybe I can even finish that bloody Tyrion chapter today...

comments.article: The parenthetical material definitely made me smile. :-)
Those calendars are so pretty. And yay! Tyrion is one of my favourites :D

comments.upictitle: J3n the Destruct0r: OH HAI I LIEK ABORTIONS
comments.article:
W00t! High five!

Mutilated dwarves are GO!
Yay! Tyrion's my favourite character! :D

What? You were signing calendars instead of writing DANCE? How dare you! I bet you've even eaten today! OMFG, I can't believe how selfish you are. Next thing you know, you'll think you have the right to bathe.

...when I first read it, I thought you meant that you were going to go move joyfully in time to music to celebrate the calendars being done...and then I engaged my brain. Duh. Hope the writing goes well! BTW, this is Megan, your Wild Cards webmistress. :0)

comments.upictitle: The Kwisatz Haderach, Give A Dog A Bone: pic#80183639
comments.article: Hey, he can dance if he wants to.
Oog. Your poor hand! Heh. Now I wish I had ordered one.
A "bloody" Tyrion chapter?  Hope that's not Tyrion's blood...
comments.subject: Uh oh..

comments.article:
That's my favorite picture in the whole calendar! I almost want to take my calendar apart and frame it. X3

Good luck on the chapter!
Aren't all Tyrion chapters bloody?
Hey, if I finished my bloody thesis draft last night, you can finish your chapter!
Love that image of Tyrion in the sky cell. The blue is calling, indeed.
Awesome!
Wait. Are you giving us a hint? Is this Tyrion chapter extra-bloody!? :D
Hooray for calendars! Hooray for Tyrion! My husband and I adore him :D
Tyrion chapter are not as bloody as Dany's ones... aren't they? xD
Leave the Tyrion chapter 'till tomorrow to get under the skin of everyone who bugs you about being "late".
*grumble grumble*

Yes!
I hope the chapter goes smoothly- don't force it. If I ever got good writing advice, it's "write the story you would want to read".
That sometimes gets my stuff moving. Although, I have to emphasize "sometimes".

Good luck to you, George!
comments.subject: Nice

comments.article: GO GO GO!

George.

So you did signed those wrong calendars, and now we are not getting what we ordered last august!!! :o(

We ordered signed calendar, numbered copy with limited edition cover, and extra material inside... and this, what we ordered, we are not going to get now, if we ever going to get these copies for ourselves, because we haven´t got those promised gift calendars neither!!!

I have really, really, depressed mood in here Finland!!!

I have e-mailed Derek and Les for this error, and I know that they don´t answer me, but I personally think that they should send next years Ice & Fire 2010 calendar for free to us, who ordered this signed one, to fix this ULTIMATE FUCK UP of theirs!!! :o(
comments.subject: I can´t get what I ordered. :o(

comments.article: Maybe by bloody chapter he means that Ty is going to walk in on Jamie donking there sister while shes on her rag, again...
Good luck with Dance!
Mmmmmmmmmmmmm. All is good.
comments.subject: Calendar! DANCE!

comments.article:
Cheers!

Doubly so, as I was just hoping you'd update what you're reading.
